Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Princeton
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th Terminal; WB: 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted and 95th near 95th/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Princeton, due to street blockage near 95th/Princeton.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
